name: Lord of the Click: Interstellar Wars
name_original: Lord of the Click: Interstellar Wars
description:
Fight aliens and mutants, colonize new planets, reach for the stars and let your fingers do the job of eradicating all enemy presence. You know you're gonna love it as it’s so much fun!
A game from the clicker genre with elements of strategy, with a top view, in which you play as a space commander fighting against hostile forces. Your army is diverse and each unit has unique combat characteristics. Challenge them to battle on the battlefield with one click where you will undoubtedly win and be able to develop and improve your characteristics!
